review: LOVE my Fire Sticks!  I bought 3 - one for every tv!  I can watch all my Amazon Prime, Hulu and Netflix shows and movies as well as other tv stations that have apps (Lifetime, PBS, etc.)!  I also LOVE that I can listen to Pandora in stereo sound, from any room in the house!  Can't say enough about it!  A great alternative to cable!!  :)
author: Sue A
